exclusion.criterion: patients receiving opioids or other analgesics, sedatives, hypnotics
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: allergic to drugs used in the study protocol
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: refuse to sign the informed consent and chronic pain
exclusion.label: met

notes: A 60-year-old Spanish man with COPD, presenting with shortness of breath. He smokes 20 cigarettes per day.
